an7.40:1.1: “Sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu cittam vase vatteti, no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati.
an7.40:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu samadhikusalo hoti, samadhissa samapattikusalo hoti, samadhissa thitikusalo hoti, samadhissa vutthanakusalo hoti, samadhissa kalyanakusalo hoti, samadhissa gocarakusalo hoti, samadhissa abhiniharakusalo hoti.
an7.40:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu cittam vase vatteti, no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati”ti.
